verbs.description: rufus giwa poly [V: announces] [ARG1: resumption date fines students n12 000 each] [ARG3: over protest] ondo state government - owned rufus polytechnic owo rugipo has asked its students to return to campus for academic activities after a break of three months banji alabi chairman of the governing board of the polytechnic announced the resumption of academic activities at the institution in a press statement issued on tuesday in akure our correspondent reported that the students shut down rufus giwa polytechnic owo on the 23rd of january 2018 following a violent protest rufus giwa polytechnic owo rufus giwa polytechnic governing board protest rufus polytechnic owo polytechnic community banji alabi governing council governor rotimi akeredolu rufus giwa poly
